Functions

{% raw %}

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to to

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

The function say hello.

{% raw %} 
say_hello("yafi")

'hello yafi!'
{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
from fastcore.test import *

test_eq(say_hello("yafi"), "hello yafi!")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class HelloSayer:
    "say hello to to using say_hello"
    def __init__(self, to):
        self.to = to

    def say(self): 
        "do the saying"
        return say_hello(self.to)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
o = HelloSayer("shirin")
o.say()

'hello shirin!'
{% endraw %}
